Collection.Description: Used by the CLR shim to identify the version of runtime required by a specific application. This setting overrides the default which is stored in the registry.
Determines if CLR Garbage Collection should run concurrently or non-concurrently.
Tells the runtime where to probe for additional private assemblies.

Property.Description: Specifies multiple sub folders to the app that contain assemblies. Semicolon delimited relative paths.

Collection.Description: Specifies whether or not publisher policy stored in the GAC should be applied to the entire application or a specific dependency.

Property.Description: Specifies whether or not to use the publisher policy. Defaults to true.
Specifies the name of the dependency.
Contains a hex value that specifies the strong name for this dependency.
Contains a string value that specifies the language and country/region for this dependency. Value based on RFC1766 (<language>-<country/region>)

Collection.Description: Redirects requests for one version of an assembly to another version.

Property.Description: Specifies the version of the dependency that was originally requested.
Specifies the version of the dependency to use instead of the requested version.
Specifies the name of the dependency.
Contains a hex value that specifies the strong name for this dependency.
Contains a string value that specifies the language and country/region for this dependency. Value based on RFC1766 (<language>-<country/region>)

Collection.Description: Indicates where a specific version of a dependent assembly can be found.

Property.Description: Specifies the version of the dependency for which this codebase applies.
Specifies the url where this version of the dependency can be located for installation.
Specifies the name of the dependency.
Contains a hex value that specifies the strong name for this dependency.
Contains a string value that specifies the language and country/region for this dependency. Value based on RFC1766 (<language>-<country/region>)

Collection.Description: Tells the runtime if the development mode binding policy should be enabled.

Property.Description: A value of true enables the development mode binding policy. False uses regular binding policy (default).
